abilities.description: Rebirth: If your phoenix misses on Companion @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.fdb51ee928b4fca2]{Endure Harm} when at 0 health, roll +heart. On a strong hit, the phoenix bursts into flame dealing 3 harm to foes and returns to life with 3 health. On a weak hit, the flame deals only I harm and the phoenix returns with only 1 health.
Phoenix Down: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.92b85c33a17ab487]{Face Death} with your phoenix by your side, add +2 and take +1 momentum on a strong hit.

Heart of Fire: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.ac19f4c7f3fe31be]{Undertake a Journey} through the bitter cold with your phoenix burning brightly, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
